messages.content: If I had a large, square, pane of glass that was standing upright, and I allowed it to fall over onto a smooth, flat surface, what would happen to the glass?
The glass would shatter into many pieces.
Would the air being pushed out of the way have any effect, or would the glass still break?
The air being pushed out of the way would have no effect, and the glass would still break.
What of the cushion of air just before the glass is flat?
The air just before the glass is flat would cause the glass to shatter into more pieces.
